title: Secret Key Cryptography SKC where
extract: The majority of the sensitive data sent in an SSL session is sent using secret key cryptography. Secret key cryptography is also called symmetric cryptography because the same key is used to both encrypt and decrypt the data.
extract_html: The majority of the sensitive data sent in an SSL session is sent using secret key cryptography. Secret key cryptography is also called symmetric cryptography because the same key is used to both encrypt and decrypt the data.
